item.title: InverterdPendelum
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction The inverted pendulum is one of the most popular demonstrations in system control, has been studied since the 19601 and prime example at unis and other reseach institutes. However the inverted pendulum, which is nothing more than a pendulum that has the center of mass above the pivot point, yet has not particular use case. To change this once in for all, I build a inverted pendulum lamp, which can be used as a normal stylsh desk lanmp.
